body_html: Sorry for the delay @satok16 . I guess the problem is the fact that the hexagon_graph_execution binary was built for ARM and not meant to be used with Hexagon-sim. I guess I have to reproduce libhexagon_controller.so and libhexagon_nn_skel.so from scratch using their provided hexagon-clang compiler. Am I right ?
body_text: Sorry for the delay @satok16 . I guess the problem is the fact that the hexagon_graph_execution binary was built for ARM and not meant to be used with Hexagon-sim. I guess I have to reproduce libhexagon_controller.so and libhexagon_nn_skel.so from scratch using their provided hexagon-clang compiler. Am I right ?
body: Sorry for the delay @satok16 . I guess the problem is the fact that the `hexagon_graph_execution` binary was built for ARM and not meant to be used with Hexagon-sim. I guess I have to reproduce `libhexagon_controller.so` and `libhexagon_nn_skel.so` from scratch using their provided hexagon-clang compiler. Am I right ?
